question: I pay monthly installment of Rs. 7,000 per month, I want to ask you that 'Zakat' and 'Qurbani' is wajid on me or not
answer:
QUESTION

I want to ask you that (1) My monthly earning is arround Rs. 11,500, I have booked a Flat <for residence purpose> worth Rs. 340,000 Rs. 125,000 (HB Loan), I have paid Rs. 169,000 till now, for this I have taken loan of Rs. 75,000 from my relative (Still to be paid). I pay monthly installment of Rs. 7,000 per month, I want to ask you that 'Zakat' and 'Qurbani' is wajid on me or not. jazakallah

ANSWER


Share:

According to our understanding, your liabilities including payment for the house is approximately Rs200,000.

Zakaat and Qurbaani is not compulsory upon you.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
